quote: I'm not feeling very well - I need a doctor immediately. Ring the nearest golf course.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: They certainly give very strange names to diseases.
name: Plato

quote: Getting out of the hospital is a lot like resigning from a book club. You're not out of it until the computer says you're out of it.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Medicine is my lawful wife and literature my mistress when I get tired of one, I spend the night with the other.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: When I was born I was so ugly the doctor slapped my mother.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Doctors are just the same as lawyers the only difference is that lawyers merely rob you, whereas doctors rob you and kill you too.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: The doctor sees all the weakness of mankind the lawyer all the wickedness, the theologian all the stupidity.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Doctors will have more lives to answer for in the next world than even we generals.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: All sorts of computer errors are now turning up. You'd be surprised to know the number of doctors who claim they are treating pregnant men.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Illness is the doctor to whom we pay most heed to kindness, to knowledge, we make promise only pain we obey.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Three-quarters of the sicknesses of intelligent people come from their intelligence. They need at least a doctor who can understand this sickness.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: A physician's physiology has much the same relation to his power of healing as a cleric's divinity has to his power of influencing conduct.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: Modern medicine is a negation of health. It isn't organized to serve human health, but only itself, as an institution. It makes more people sick than it heals.
name: Ivan Illich

quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
name: Hippocrates

quote: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: I was going to have cosmetic surgery until I noticed that the doctor's office was full of portraits by Picasso.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: As a medical doctor, it is my duty to evaluate the situation with as much data as I can gather and as much expertise as I have and as much experience as I have to determine whether or not the wish of the patient is medically justified.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: Time is generally the best doctor.
name: Ovid

quote: My doctor gave me six months to live, but when I couldn't pay the bill he gave me six months more.
name: Walter Matthau

quote: When I told my doctor I couldn't afford an operation, he offered to touch-up my X-rays.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
name: Lewis Thomas

quote: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
name: Ovid

quote: I was always shocked when I went to the doctor's office and they did my X-ray and didn't find that I had eight more ribs than I should have or that my blood was the color green.
name: Nicolas Cage

quote: In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man: survival.
name: Edward Everett Hale

quote: The doctors x-rayed my head and found nothing.
name: Dizzy Dean

quote: I'm 86 and my doctor used to tell me to slow down - at least he did until he dropped dead.
name: Cesar Romero

quote: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back in the shell.
name: Cass Canfield

quote: You can die of the cure before you die of the illness.
name: Michael Landon

quote: People are so afraid of authority figures and doctors are authority figures.
name: Martha Beck

quote: The physician's highest calling, his only calling, is to make sick people healthy - to heal, as it is termed.
name: Samuel Hahnemann

quote: It is reasonable to expect the doctor to recognize that science may not have all the answers to problems of health and healing.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Growing up, my dolls were doctors and on secret missions. I had Barbie Goes Rambo.
name: Zoe Saldana

quote: When a man goes through six years training to be a doctor he will never be the same. He knows too much.
name: Enid Bagnold

quote: Flying back from New York, the flight attendant said 'God, I wished you were here yesterday, we had a stroke on the plane. I said, if I have a stroke on a plane, I hope the pretend doctor isn't the one on the plane. I want a real doctor.
name: Anthony Edwards

quote: America has the best doctors, the best nurses, the best hospitals, the best medical technology, the best medical breakthrough medicines in the world. There is absolutely no reason we should not have in this country the best health care in the world.
name: Bill Frist

quote: I went to the doctor and he said I had acute appendicitis, and I said compared to who?
name: Jay London

quote: I'm strongly for a patient Bill of Rights. Decisions ought to be made by doctors, not accountants.
name: Charles Schumer

quote: I'm by no means condemning prescription medicine for mental health. I've seen it save a lot of people's lives.
name: Zach Braff

quote: Mammograms are really sort of a gift. You can either catch something early or count your lucky stars because nothing was discovered. Either way, you're ahead of the game.
name: Charlotte Ross

quote: If you look at the human condition today, not everyone is well fed, has access to good medical care, or the physical basics that provide for a healthy and a happy life.
name: Ralph Merkle

quote: Passion, you see, can be destroyed by a doctor. It cannot be created.
name: Peter Shaffer

quote: In the sick room, ten cents' worth of human understanding equals ten dollars' worth of medical science.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: Medical liability reform is not a Republican or Democrat issue or even a doctor versus lawyer issue. It is a patient issue.
name: John Ensign

quote: The art of medicine was to be properly learned only from its practice and its exercise.
name: Thomas Sydenham

quote: A pregnant woman facing the most dire circumstances must be able to count on her doctor to do what is medically necessary to protect her from serious physical harm.
name: Barbara Mikulski

quote: I got the bill for my surgery. Now I know what those doctors were wearing masks for.
name: James H. Boren

quote: Honestly, being a doctor could make you more close minded than regular people.
name: Alex Chiu

quote: As a physician, I know many doctors want to utilize new technology, but they find the cost prohibitive.
name: Nathan Deal

quote: I regret to this day that I never went to college. I feel I should have been a doctor.
name: Ty Cobb

quote: One has a greater sense of degradation after an interview with a doctor than from any human experience.
name: Alice James

quote: Doctors coin money when they do procedures but family medicine doesn't have any procedures.
name: David Jones

quote: If you want total security, go to prison. There you're fed, clothed, given medical care and so on. The only thing lacking... is freedom.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
name: Mark Twain

quote: You know, if I listened to Michael Dukakis long enough, I would be convinced we're in an economic downturn and people are homeless and going without food and medical attention and that we've got to do something about the unemployed.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: These technologies can make life easier, can let us touch people we might not otherwise. You may have a child with a birth defect and be able to get in touch with other parents and support groups, get medical information, the latest experimental drugs. These things can profoundly influence life. I'm not downplaying that.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: We can't get to the $4 trillion in savings that we need by just cutting the 12 percent of the budget that pays for things like medical research and education funding and food inspectors and the weather service. And we can't just do it by making seniors pay more for Medicare.
name: Barack Obama

quote: I had the privilege of practicing medicine in the early '60s, before we had any government. It worked rather well, and there was nobody on the street suffering with no medical care.
name: Ron Paul

quote: If you're so pro-life, do me a favour: don't lock arms and block medical clinics. If you're so pro-life, lock arms and block cemeteries.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: Whenever the people are for gay marriage or medical marijuana or assisted suicide, suddenly the 'will of the people' goes out the window.
name: Bill Maher

quote: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
name: Samora Machel

quote: Vaccination is the medical sacrament corresponding to baptism. Whether it is or is not more efficacious I do not know.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Folks, the most insidious part of this whole health care scheme is that all of these vast medical expenditures will become nothing more than government budget items. We individuals will no longer exist. The relationship between a government and citizen will change forever.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
name: Anita Baker

quote: A Harvard Medical School study has determined that rectal thermometers are still the best way to tell a baby's temperature. Plus, it really teaches the baby who's boss.
name: Tina Fey

quote: I went to medical school because I wanted to ask the big questions. Do we have a soul? Does God exist? What happens after death?
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: No one should have to choose between medicine and other necessities. No one should have to use the emergency room every time a child gets sick. And no one should have to live in constant fear that a medical problem will become a financial crisis.
name: Brad Henry

quote: Medical science has proven time and again that when the resources are provided, great progress in the treatment, cure, and prevention of disease can occur.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: It seems sensible to me that we should look to the medical profession, that over the centuries has helped us to live longer and healthier lives, to help us die peacefully among our loved ones in our own home without a long stay in God's waiting room.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: I believe it should be possible for someone stricken with a serious and ultimately fatal illness to choose to die peacefully with medical help, rather than suffer.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: Finish last in your league and they call you idiot. Finish last in medical school and they call you doctor.
name: Abe Lemons

quote: A retired teacher paid $62,000 towards her pension and nothing, yes nothing, for full family medical, dental and vision coverage over her entire career. What will we pay her? $1.4 million in pension benefits and another $215,000 in health care benefit premiums over her lifetime.
name: Chris Christie

quote: The medical literature tells us that the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease, cancer, stroke, diabetes, Alzheimer's, and many more problems are through healthy diet and exercise. Our bodies have evolved to move, yet we now use the energy in oil instead of muscles to do our work.
name: David Suzuki

quote: Against the State, against the Church, against the silence of the medical profession, against the whole machinery of dead institutions of the past, the woman of today arises.
name: Margaret Sanger

quote: Stay out of the sun, because it is the worst thing in terms of aging. I'm very medical. I come from a medical family.
name: Nicole Kidman

quote: What's important at the grocery store is just as important in engines or medical systems. If the customer isn't satisfied, if the stuff is getting stale, if the shelf isn't right, or if the offerings aren't right, it's the same thing. You manage it like a small organization. You don't get hung up on zeros.
name: Jack Welch

quote: Information on how to heal autism and how to possibly delay vaccines or prevent autism shouldn't come from me. It should come from the medical establishment.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: I have been recently diagnosed with Sjogren's Syndrome, an autoimmune disease which is an ongoing medical condition that affects my energy level and causes fatigue and joint pain.
name: Venus Williams

quote: Civil and political rights are critical, but not often the real problem for the destitute sick. My patients in Haiti can now vote but they can't get medical care or clean water.
name: Paul Farmer

quote: I know we can't always know what medical surprises may happen during childbirth. But my hope is to go fully natural - no epidural, no interventions. Wish me luck.
name: Danica McKellar

quote: But I contend that if we're providing total medical coverage for every man, woman, and child in Iraq, shouldn't we at least be doing the same thing for every man, woman, and child in the United States?
name: Tony Campolo

quote: Money has transformed every watchdog, every independent authority. Medical doctors are increasingly gulled by the lobbying of pharmaceutical salesmen.
name: Thomas Frank

quote: Liberal that I am, I support health-care reform on its merits alone. My liberal blood boils, for example, when I read that half of the personal bankruptcies in this country are brought on, in part, by medical expenses.
name: Thomas Frank

quote: My dad's a doctor, and when I was 8, I went to one of his medical conferences where they were demonstrating laser surgery on a chicken. I was so mad that a chicken had to die, I never ate meat again.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: I first wanted to be a psychiatrist. I decided against that in medical school when I discovered that psychiatrists didn't, in reality, do what they did on TV.
name: Benjamin Carson

quote: Over the years my mother's steadfast faith in God has inspired me, particularly when I had to perform extremely difficult surgical procedures or when I found myself faced with my own medical scare.
name: Benjamin Carson

quote: I think first and foremost everybody should understand that Canadians are strongly committed to the system of universal health insurance, to the principle that your ability to pay does not determine your access to critical medical service.
name: Stephen Harper

quote: The best way to reduce the cost of medical care is to reduce the illness.
name: Arlen Specter

quote: If we can reduce the cost and improve the quality of medical technology through advances in nanotechnology, we can more widely address the medical conditions that are prevalent and reduce the level of human suffering.
name: Ralph Merkle

quote: My parents and grandparents have always been engaged in teaching or the medical profession or the priesthood, so I've sort of grown up with a sense of complicity in the lives of other people, so there's no virtue in that it's the way one is raised.
name: Colin Firth

quote: Medical knowledge and technical savvy are biodegradable. The sort of medicine that was practiced in Boston or New York or Atlanta fifty years ago would be as strange to a medical student or intern today as the ceremonial dance of a !Kung San tribe would seem to a rock festival audience in Hackensack.
name: Lewis Thomas

quote: The dilemma of modern medicine, and the underlying central flaw in medical education and, most of all, in the training of interns, is the irresistible drive to do something, anything. It is expected by patients and too often agreed to by their doctors, in the face of ignorance.
name: Lewis Thomas

quote: It worries me about our unwillingness to really address reforms and modernization in Medicare. This thing was designed 37 years ago. It has not evolved to keep pace with current medical technology.
name: John Sununu

quote: Mind you, I've always been a very off-message type of fat broad one who gladly admits she reached the size she is now solely through lack of discipline and love of pleasure, and who rather despises people (except those with proven medical conditions) who pretend that it is generally otherwise.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: One goes through school, college, medical school and one's internship learning little or nothing about goodness but a good deal about success.
name: Ashley Montagu

quote: There have been some medical schools in which somewhere along the assembly line, a faculty member has informed the students, not so much by what he said but by what he did, that there is an intimate relation between curing and caring.
name: Ashley Montagu

quote: It is clear that the pharmaceutical industry is not, by any stretch of the imagination, doing enough to ensure that the poor have access to adequate medical care.
name: Paul Farmer

quote: The main reason for the failure of the modern medical science is that it is dealing with results and not causes. Nothing more than the patching up of those attacked and the burying of those who are slain, without a thought being given to the real strong hold.
name: Edward Bach

quote: I read Freud's Introductory Lectures in Psychoanalysis in basically one sitting. I decided to enroll in medical school. It was almost like a conversion experience.
name: Stanislav Grof

quote: Citizens must pressure the American Hospital Association, the American Public Health Association, the Centers for Disease Control and other relevant governmental agencies to make greening our hospitals and medical centers a top priority so that they themselves don't create even more illness.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: We need to accept the seemingly obvious fact that a toxic environment can make people sick and that no amount of medical intervention can protect us. The health care community must become a powerful political lobby for environmental policy and legislation.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: I have written two medical novels. I have never studied medicine, never seen an operation.
name: Taylor Caldwell

quote: Medical debts are the number-one cause of bankruptcy in America.
name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: I took anatomy classes. I went to medical libraries and talked to doctors and nutritionists. I did the whole thing before using myself as a human guinea pig.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: The patient's autonomy always, always should be respected, even if it is absolutely contrary - the decision is contrary to best medical advice and what the physician wants.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I'm trying to knock the medical profession into accepting its responsibilities, and those responsibilities include assisting their patients with death.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: And as a nurse, I know very well the importance, for example, of electronic medical records.
name: Lois Capps

quote: I mean, everybody should have access to medical care. And, you know, it shouldn't be such a big deal.
name: Paul Farmer

quote: Researches tested a new form of medical marijuana that treats pain but doesn't get the user high, prompting patients who need medical marijuana to declare, 'Thank you?'
name: Jimmy Fallon

quote: As far as hypnosis is concerned, I had a very serious problem when I was in my twenties. I encountered a man who later became the president of the American Society of Medical Hypnosis. He couldn't hypnotize me.
name: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: I don't think there's any independent cartoonist whose stuff I don't like or respect in at least some way or another. We're all marginal laborers - we're practically medical oddities - so I don't see why we can't all be nice to each other.
name: Chris Ware

quote: President Obama and his radical feminist enforcers have had it in for Catholic medical providers from the get-go. It's about time all people of faith fought back against this unprecedented encroachment on religious liberty. First, they came for the Catholics. Who's next?
name: Michelle Malkin

quote: The public has lost faith in the ability of Social Security and Medicare to provide for old age. They've lost faith in the banking system and in conventional medical insurance.
name: Ron Chernow

quote: Five thousand people every day lose their home because of a medical bankruptcy. Most of them had insurance.
name: Debbie Stabenow

quote: Medical professionals, not insurance company bureaucrats, should be making health care decisions.
name: Barbara Boxer

quote: We have the greatest hospitals, doctors, and medical technology in the world - we need to make them accessible to every American.
name: Barbara Boxer

quote: Remember, I'm a doctor's daughter. So obviously I'm interested in all medical things.
name: Nancy Reagan

quote: It was my Uncle George who discovered that alcohol was a food well in advance of modern medical thought.
name: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: I am very abnormal... But it wasn't very long ago that I wasn't so abnormal. I was very normal and headed for a lifetime of paying medical bills as proof of my normalcy.
name: Dirk Benedict

quote: The Google algorithm was a significant development. I've had thank-you emails from people whose lives have been saved by information on a medical website or who have found the love of their life on a dating website.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: Today, all patients accepted for treatment at St. Jude's are treated without regard for the family's ability to pay. Everything beyond what is covered by insurance is taken care of, and for those without insurance, all of the medical costs are absorbed by the hospital.
name: Marlo Thomas

quote: Many of us are alarmed at the skyrocketing cost of medical care, including patients, who are the consumers. However, medical malpractice is not the reason for these increasing costs.
name: Joe Baca

quote: In our own state, we came up with, I think, what was a very novel approach to closing the gap on the uninsured. To harmonize medical records - which was a major step in getting costs out of the system.
name: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quote: I basically believe the medical insurance industry should be nonprofit, not profit-making. There is no way a health reform plan will work when it is implemented by an industry that seeks to return money to shareholders instead of using that money to provide health care.
name: Dianne Feinstein

quote: To date, embryonic stem cell research has not produced a single medical treatment, where ethical, adult stem cell research has produced some 67 medical miracles.
name: Mike Pence

quote: Here in Silicon Valley, I have taken part in hundreds of conversations trying to convince people to dive in and become entrepreneurs. All too often, innovators with good, safe, jobs are unwilling to put their family's access to health care at risk by walking away from company-backed medical insurance.
name: Eric Ries

quote: Synergy and serendipity often play a big part in medical and scientific advances.
name: Julie Bishop

quote: Advances in science and medical research and public health policies have meant that life expectancy for Australians is one of the highest in the world.
name: Julie Bishop

quote: Over 120 Aboriginal communities run their own health services - some have been doing so for 30 years. They struggle with difficult medical problems. They also try to deal with counselling, stolen generations issues, family relationships, violence, suicide prevention.
name: Malcolm Fraser

quote: Because I am not formally trained in the medical sciences, I can bring in new ideas to AIDS research and the cross-fertilization of ideas from different fields could be a valuable contribution to finding the cure for AIDS.
name: Philip Emeagwali

quote: If I'm pushed, I'd also have to admit I don't like people with allergies. They just annoy me. There seems to be something far too self-centred about it. 'No thanks, I'm allergic.' Why not just say 'No thanks'? I wasn't asking for your medical history, I was just passing around the nuts. Trying to be friendly, that's all.
name: Jack Dee

quote: Haiti is always talking about decentralization and nothing has been so obvious, perhaps a weakness, as the centralized nature of Haitian society as being revealed by the earthquake. I mean, they lost all these medical training programs because they didn't have them anywhere else.
name: Paul Farmer

quote: The growth of technology is such that it is not possible today for a nuclear physicist to switch into medical physics without training. The field is now much more technical. More training is needed to do the job.
name: John Cameron

quote: It's interesting when people make comments about celebrities' weight gain or lack of weight gain as if they're a medical professional that's treating that celebrity. Like, 'This doctor does not treat Jessica Simpson, but thinks her weight is unhealthy.' If you don't treat her, then how do you know?
name: Busy Philipps

quote: No one wants to go back to a situation where, if you have a pre-existing medical condition, you, you can be deprived of coverage. No one wants to go back to a situation where, if you get seriously ill, you can get thrown off your insurance. Seniors don't want to go back to paying more for their prescription drugs.
name: David Axelrod

quote: There is an element of anger among women who've been raped. There's certainly a major element of humiliation. But it really does seem like a medical condition of shock and horror.
name: Nicholas D. Kristof

quote: Yet it looks as if the thing we use to solve our problems with is the source of our problems. It's like going to the doctor and having him make you ill. In fact, in 20% of medical cases we do apparently have that going on. But in the case of thought, its far over 20%.
name: David Bohm

quote: Abortion is inherently different from other medical procedures because no other procedure involves the purposeful termination of a potential life.
name: Potter Stewart

quote: My mother was told she couldn't go to medical school because she was a woman and a Jew. So she became a teacher in the New York City public school system.
name: Marilyn Hacker

quote: Medical decisions have been politicized. What doctor wants a state legislator in his consulting room?
name: Garry Trudeau

quote: I do not believe that Congress or the Administration should prohibit the medical community from pursuing a promising avenue of research that may improve the lives of millions of Americans.
name: Tom Allen

quote: When I went to the University, the medical school was the only place where one could hope to find the means to study life, its nature, its origins, and its ills.
name: Albert Claude

quote: I'd come out of the army after five years as a medic. I was a medical administrator and we ran hospitals, and I was a Captain in the army at the end, in 1945.
name: Eli Wallach

quote: We also have a program in place for low income people. A family of four making $26,000 a year can receive medical coverage, irrespective of citizenship or what documents.
name: George Pataki

quote: If someone lives in New York, he's a New Yorker - they are entitled to the best medical system in the world.
name: George Pataki

quote: The World Health Organisation has a lot of its medical experts sitting in Geneva while hospitals in Africa have no drugs and desperate patients are forced to seek medication on the black market.
name: Pauline Hanson

quote: Listening to medical facts was not enough. People wanted one hundred percent guarantees.
name: Ryan White

quote: During a trip to Iraq last fall, I visited our theater hospital at Balad Air Force Base and witnessed these skilled medical professionals in action and met the brave soldiers whose lives they saved.
name: Melissa Bean

quote: If we don't change, millions of American families are just one medical emergency, or one layoff, away from financial disaster and bankruptcy.
name: Jim Cooper

quote: When I took command in Vietnam, I gave great emphasis to food and medical care - and to the mail.
name: William Westmoreland

quote: In my second year, after moving to the Medical School, I began the courses of Anatomy and Physiology. I had begun to see that I was interested in cells and their functions.
name: Sydney Brenner

quote: As a player, I was fortunate to work with coaching and medical staffs that underscored the importance of utilizing injury prevention exercises, which contributed to my healthy and long playing career.
name: Cobi Jones

quote: For my convalescence, I had to exercise my voice only with vowels. It is a medical rule after a long loss of voice.
name: Nana Mouskouri

quote: When I was born in 1970 with a rare genetic disorder called spondyloepiphyseal dysplasia congenita (SED), medical science wasn't what it is today and my mum and dad were treated terribly by the medical profession.
name: Warwick Davis

quote: Developments in medical technology have long been confined to procedural or pharmaceutical advances, while neglecting a most basic and essential component of medicine: patient information management.
name: John Doolittle

quote: The Navy's paid for you to go through school, and then they need doctors to go out and take care of people who are in various different parts of the world. I decided to pay back my time first as an undersea medical officer. I was stationed in Scotland.
name: Laurel Clark

quote: Only medical hypnosis is capable of opening up amnesia.
name: Betty Hill

quote: Today we see a human population of over 6 billion people, many of whom have serious medical conditions, which either can't be treated or cannot be treated economically.
name: Ralph Merkle

quote: I can help a lot of other people who've gone through the same thing by building a center that will help men and women who don't have the funds to take care of themselves and get the medical treatment.
name: David Gest

quote: Long gone are the days when hospital stays and surgeries made up the bulk of seniors' annual medical expenses.
name: Jim Gerlach

quote: Without true medical liability reform, our doctors will continue to leave, and young doctors coming out of medical school $100,000 to $200,000 in debt will not be able to afford such onerous costs.
name: Jim Gerlach

quote: Informed consent is required for every invasive medical procedure, from getting your ears pierced to having an abortion.
name: Bob McDonnell

quote: The whole story of the comfort women, the system of forced sexual slavery, the medical experiments of Unit 731, is not something that is in the US psyche. That is changing because many books are coming out.
name: Iris Chang

quote: I decided to start a medical training program for freelancers, only freelancers. They're the ones who are doing most of the combat reporting. They're taking most of the risks. They're absorbing most of the casualties. And they're the most underserved and under-resourced of everyone in the entire news business.
name: Sebastian Junger

quote: Corporate governance is a huge issue too. We don't have women on these corporate boards. More than half of the students in law school are women, more than half of the women, I think, in medical school now are women.
name: Claire McCaskill

quote: With tens of thousands of patients dying every year from preventable medical errors, it is imperative that we embrace available technologies and drastically improve the way medical records are handled and processed.
name: Jon Porter

quote: We cannot sacrifice innocent human life now for vague and exaggerated promises of medical treatments thirty of forty years from now. There are ways to pursue this technology and respect life at the same time.
name: Ernest Istook

quote: The great medical facilities are a relief for the parents, too, who don't have to think about caring for their young ones on their own for a weekend. They have a great time.
name: Jami Gertz

quote: Community health centers do a great deal with limited resources. They provide critical medical care services to many who would otherwise have no other place to go or would end up in an emergency room.
name: Jan Schakowsky

quote: For many people, managing pain involves using prescription medicine in combination with complementary techniques like physical therapy, acupuncture, yoga and massage. I appreciate this because I truly believe medical care should address the person as a whole - their mind, body, and spirit.
name: Naomi Judd

quote: When I talked to my medical friends about the strange silence on this subject in American medical magazines and textbooks, I gained the impression that here was a subject tainted with Socialism or with feminine sentimentality for the poor.
name: Alice Hamilton

quote: Oh there are lots of doctors and medical professionals out there who buy my devices at whole sale price.
name: Alex Chiu

quote: Immortality Device has been tested and researched by medical researchers all over the world from time to time. They email me and told me what they found. I post their results sometimes on my site.
name: Alex Chiu

quote: That's the thing. in medicine, you're used to saying there's a problem within the person, and saying there's a problem within the culture, that's not a medical answer. Medicine has to look in one direction, so there's only one type of answer that they can find.
name: Chester Brown

quote: I founded a launch company called International Microspace when I graduated medical school in 1989. We were trying to build a microsatellite launcher.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: I've been advised not to have any more children for medical reasons, so that's it - the shop has closed, even though I would have loved a daughter.
name: Toni Braxton

quote: Ensuring Americans have access to adequate medical care should be a priority for all of us.
name: Dave Reichert

quote: I'd visit the near future, close enough that someone might want to talk to Larry Niven and can figure out the language distant enough to get me decent medical techniques and a ticket to the Moon.
name: Larry Niven

quote: Procedures outside the stadiums and in the parking areas still need to be optimized, for example so that emergency medical services can leave the grounds on their way to the hospital faster.
name: Otto Schily

quote: Prior to penicillin and medical research, death was an everyday occurrence. It was intimate.
